info.name: scene_contact_test_01
info.description:
This test uses the drycontact interface to invoke scenes.  It is based off scene_test_01 as a basis but just uses the dry contact interface to trigger the scene invokation.
The 4 inputs have a different scene triggered on the active and inactive edges

exec: tests["Status code is 200"] = responseCode.code === 200;
